name: @crewx/example-api-agent-basic
description: Basic API Agent example for CrewX

scripts.test:openai: crewx query '@gpt_assistant What is quantum computing?' -c crewx-openai.yaml
scripts.test:claude: crewx query '@claude_assistant Explain machine learning' -c crewx-claude.yaml
scripts.test:ollama: crewx query '@local_llama Tell me a joke' -c crewx-ollama.yaml

author: CrewX Team
